Fight climate change and become carbon neutral in 1 click on Amazon or Ask Alexa "Alexa, order carbon neutral."
Canada’s leading provider of sustainability and carbon-management solutions, Offsetters helps organizations and individuals understand, reduce and offset their environmental impacts.

ClearMetal employs concepts of IoT, machine learning and Big Data analytics to process shipping and container movement data from around the globe, and using it to predict the future flows of trade and provide business insights to its clients. The company provides services like SCM, freight flow management, predictive yield and asset management etc.
Janio provides cross-border logistics services that simplifies deliveries across borders.

MDX provides a real-time market data collaboration solutions for the trading community, catering to traders, developers and market data professionals in the capital markets, energy and commodities sectors.

Datamyne provides detailed, authoritative data on the import-export trade of some 50 countries across 5 continents including US trade with over 200 markets. Offers access to a searchable database of import-export trade related to cargos, markets, and trading partners. Aggregates data from bills of lading, manifests, and customs declarations in the US, Latin America, Europe, and Asia. Serves importers/wholesalers & exporters, financial & industry analysts, chemical companies, legal practitioners, manufacturers, transportation & logistic service providers, management consultants, health & nutrition, and energy industries.

Tradefox is an online solution for industrial raw supplies and analytics software. The product catalogue includes shredded scrap, ferrous & non-ferrous metals, plastics, rods, and more. Users can search for desired products using filters like nearby region, material and company type. It also provides market analysis and trade activity reports. It caters to factories, automotive industries, demolition & waste collection, scrap yards, recyclers, brokers, freight forwarders, shipping & transport, mills, and foundries. Its app is available for Android users.

LogComex is a SaaS-based analytics solution for the logistics industry. The company offers an online platform which can be integrated with other third-party systems for providing to access necessary data. Through this data, the company offers visibility and real-time data-driven insights into shipments/cargo & its tracking based on real-time external factors. Additionally, the company also offers data-driven insights on logistics operations from information (sourced from logistics companies from multiple countries).
column16: Digital trading operations (merged with trade execution)

column6: Ocean Insights provides data and intelligence for the logistics industry to improve visibility and transparency in ocean freight. It consolidates and evaluates ocean freight information from multiple sources using big data technologies. Combines container liner schedules and carriers’ container tracking information with neutral AIS vessel tracking data offering real-time updates of shipments, actionable details plus performance statistics. Also provides sailing schedules of all major shipping lines, as well as port-to-port schedules including transshipments, information on slot operator and slot partners, etc.

WorldACD offers market data on air cargo. The products include data on volumes, number of shipments, revenues, yields, product types, distribution etc. The data is helpful for network development, route analysis, resource allocation, product development, revenue management and global accounts management.

Sicex is the Quintero Hnos Ltda Website. Company Founded in 1923 specialises in the foreign trade data supply. Only company that offers Colombian maritime movement detailed data, based on shipment knowledge. Its product offerings include SISMAR-Columbia: daily information about imports and exports of maritime cargo movements sourced from the maritime transport documents (Bill of Lading B/L) daily, in the Colombian ports; SISMAR USA Import: maritime imports made through the American seaports; SISDUAN-World Trade: information about imports and exports reported by the customs offices from over 51 countries. The source of the information are the public documents of imports and exports declarations, issued by each customs department of every country. Apart from above data products, the company also provides custom research and consulting service.

ClipperData provides comprehensive datasets, analysis, and commentary on global crude and refined product movements. The company tracks movement on a vessel by vessel, cargo by cargo and dock to dock basis. The company sources its data using a combination of data collection technique and exclusive licensing arrangements with data providers. The company then delivers data directly to the clients desktop on a data-cube platform that enables them to drill down, filter, chart, and export inside the browser. In addition, the company also provides daily and weekly reports to give insights into emerging and evolving trends. The company serves clients in energy, logistics, and financial sectors.

eeSea has created the intelligence portal for the global container transport eco-system. The portal offers market intelligence & basic shipping information for vessels, companies, ports & terminals, and nautical routes. In addition, the company offers relevant news and service through its portal. Two tier pricing strategy. Pricing starts at $49 per month or $499 per year.

Export Genius is a market research company of Foreign Trade. Provide Export and Import Trade and Shipment Data of USA, UK, China, Russia, Brazil, India, Argentina, Mexico, Sri Lanka and other 20 countries. Export Genius collect this information from Various Countries Customs, Ports and Shipping Companies. Also provides import export analytical reports and statistical reports of any commodities which are imported and exported via sea, air or land. Subscription based monetization model. Export Genius is Founded in year 2011 and is located at New Delhi, India.

Cybex Exim Solutions is an export import data tracking, data mining and data processing firm offering export import data, trade reports, shipment data and foreign trade data of India, China, USA, UK, Russia and other major nations. The reports are based on a combination of multiple product keywords, harmonized codes or any pre-defined parameter to give the most accurate and relevant information. Subscription based revenue model.

Portbase is an online information exchange and service platform fo ports. It is connected with all smart ports of Netherlands and provides services for containers, piece goods, bulk dry and wet bulk. Its features include export cargo handling including - notification for arrival of containers, alert export documentation etc. , barge planning, bonded warehouse alerts, transit declaration etc.

The Dollar Business is a buyer discovery and competitor analysis tool for Indian exporters and manufacturers. Its product EXIMAPS that comprises of a dashboard that helps users manage export & import businesses and monitor all transactions from one place. It also allows access to over millions of buyer and seller company profiles from across various countries. Monetizes through subscription-based pricing plans.

Think Real provides market and commodities trade intelligence provider. The focuses on providing global trade data, research, company analysis, latest industry market dynamics, database service to help enterprise clients with strategies issues and business development. The company employs analyst team that conducts data mining, processing and analysis with scientific methodologies. The company offers China trade analysis, manufacturer to business IE database, global IE database, price tracking on commodities of chemical related industries. Apart from the data, the company offers market monitoring and research reports.

Tradeviews specialises in providing trade statistics for Dry Cargo. The company aggregates its data from Customs authorities. They cleanse the data, forecasts the missing data, and prepares the reports. Subscription based business model. Prices varies as the commodities changes.

Eximpulse offers report based import - export data. User can search data on basis of HS code, Country, Port of Discharge, Month etc. Users can use statistics on international trade to identify markets, monitor prices, and manage monetary, tariff and foreign exchange policies. Its database enables users to get insights such as who is importing/exporting; what quantity and price; date of shipment; port & country.

Zepol provides subscription access to U.S. trade data tools that contain near real-time statistics on U.S. imports and exports. It offers TradeIQ, a U.S. customs bill of lading data that provides access to analyze import shipments into the United States, and find containerized shipment details; and TradeView that provides access to recent and historical trade data from the U.S. Census Bureau. The company also provides ComplianceIQ, a trade data tool that enables U.S. importers adhere to U.S. government import regulations. It serves transportation, chemical, food and beverage, textile and apparel, industrial, consumer products, and legal industries. The information comes from U.S. Customs, other government sources and also is gathered from vessel manifests filed at various ports.

ImportGenius is a web application that allows businesses to search international trade records. The company’s database contains every shipment entering the United States, allowing businesses to access contact information for each of their competitor’s overseas suppliers, or each of their overseas supplier’s U.S. customers. Access to the database is sold as a monthly subscription.

Trinence Capital offers database on trade and shipping activities around the world. The shipment data covers name, address, contact details, products, pricing details, description, quantity, HS code etc. The other solutions include Export Management for managing credit, logistic and legal risks; End Use Management for enterprise deployment, survey configuration; and Export compliance for regulatory compliance solutions;

World Insititute for Strategic Economic Research (WISER) offers international trade data and analytics. The products include Data reports on monthly trade statistics, logistics supplier catchment analysis, logistics supplier penetration, commodity country risk/return analysis, winner/loser analysis, quarterly trade index, growth decomposition analysis. The clients include manufacturing companies, government agencies, educational institutions etc.

RigDig Business Intelligence for truck data. It collects data from heavy and medium duty trucking prospects in US and generates intelligence solutions. It helps in finding active fleets and owner-operators and integrates into existing CRM tools. Its module ProspectMobile helps sales reps access database of prospects and plan sales calls, provide distribution of sales leads and give insights for OEM dealers.

Global Trade Information Services provides international merchandise trade data. The products include World Trade Atlas and Global Trade Atlas for commodities trade data. The clients include government agencies, trade promotion agencies, financial institutions, consulting firms, business associations, trade publications etc. The company claims to have data covering from 1995 to present.

DeltaEconomics offers solutions on historical and forecasted trade data. The data is sourced from United Nations, World Trade Organisation, International Monetary Fund, National Statistical Offices, the International Labour Organisation, UNCTAD etc. In addition, provides trade insights, comments and consulting services. The company claims to have data on trade information of more than 18000 products from 93 countries. Offers monthly and annual subscription pricing model.

Import Radar tracks worldwide shipping activity to provide clients current and recent activities in the import-export business. Its shipping databases reveal suppliers, importers, products, volumes, and more. Clients can search the manifests using any combination of data fields-everything from shipper to consignee, importer, and exporter, plus the product description, date, country of origin and other data points. Using this data, clients can identify suppliers, connect with new customers, and learn about their competitors’ supply chains. Monetizes through monthly subscriptions.

Neurored is a provider of SCM software solutions. It provides tools for freight rates management, Pricing/Quotation, Shipments Planning, Execution and Tracking. Its supplier relationship management and contract management solutions enable and manage sourcing systems. Freight management products help in managing and tracking shipments, it also provides a facility to integrate with freight forwarders and carriers network. It delivers its solutions integrated through salesforce platform.

InfodriveIndia group is the provider of export import competitive intelligence with over 80 Countries export import information. the company provides export import competitive intelligence from over of 80 countries customs from Bill of Lading, Shipping Bills and Bill of Entries. Claims that they serve more than 21,000 clients in 80 countries with export import reports on over 22,000 products. Apart from import-export data the company also provides Nitva BI tool. Pricing starts at rupees 12K per annum.

Mahavir Law House specializes in the business of processing & providing databases on Export-Import related information including Foreign Trade Statistics. The company publishes monthly database covering Export Import Daily Data, Exim Policy, all Notification related to DGFT, CBEC and the same information is made available through online access. The company provides online export & import daily data along with address of Indian exporters and importers as a complimentary with data subscription. Mahavir Law House also specialises in Global Export Import Shipment Data. Mahavir Law House was incorporated in 1992.

TradeData provides access to trade information from around the world for better business decisions. The company offers reports on trade statistics and provide analysis on countries. The details cover shipping port, mode of transport, quantity, product description, shipment value, product price, trade type, HS_Code etc. It also provides historical trade information of more 20 years.

PIERS gathers raw import Bills of Lading for all waterborne cargo vessels that enter and exit ports in the United States, sourced byU.S. Customs and Border Protection. Additionally, PIERS staff reporters manually collect export Bills of Lading from each port in the United States. These import and export records account for 17 million Bills of Lading collected by PIERS per year. The raw data is subsequently verified, analyzed, and synthesized with supplementary data sourced from The United Nations, United States Census,Dun & Bradstreet, and direct international country sources for use in PIERS trade intelligence tools. The synthesis of these multiple data sources forms the foundation for PIERS trade intelligence resources. PIERS also provides historical records dating from 1950 to the present. Apart from the data, the company also provides business intelligence tools for lead generation, fraud detection, to monitor contractual compliance, and to find buyers and suppliers. The company was founded in mid 1970.

TradeExim offers data solutions on Indian trade information. Provides imports and exports data for India and abroad with details on data, HS_code, commodities description, port, destination port. The clients include Lord, Tata Steel, GE, audiovision, flair, piaggio etc. Offers annual subscription pricing model.

Enantio provides international trade date. It allows users to access import and export information. It enables users to build dashboards and reports from the data to view trends and patterns from the data and draw hidden insights from the data.

TI365 is a global trade information analysis system providing trade database sourced from various official mission or business partners from more than 10 countries. Provide import trade records for 10 countries, such as North America, Russia, Ukraine, Pakistan, Argentina, Chile, Peru, Columbia, UK, Korea. Apart from its TI365 platform the company also provides China import-export data, China trade reports, and China enterprise credit reports. Pricing starts at $ 99 PM.

Global Trade Data offers data and statistics on international trade. The products include Global Customs Data, Global Trade Flow, Global Bills Data, Global Exporters and Importers, Global Trade Statistics, Trade Data Software, and others. In addition, the company also research reports on trade information.

Global Trade Data Spain offers import and export information on Spain. It covers more than 20 million import and export data with TARIC codes. The data and graphics are downloadable in Excel format. The company claims to have 1200+ clients with names like KPMG, GrupoTorremat, Uquifa, Koolair, Systemair, and others. Offers subscription-based pricing model.

ImpExp provides international trade data on imports and exports across the globe. The company offers reports covering customs import and export data; actual detailed product data; statistics on imports and exports; importers and exporters details; Monthly trade research reports etc. The company covers a total of 186 countries and segregated the reports into 6 categories namely China import and export data; US and Canada import and export data; Asia import and export data; Latin America import and export data; Europe, Africa, Oceania import and export data; Company & Market research.

Universal Trade Statistics offers export and import trade data. The data is sourced from UN Comtrade along with national and regional sources. The data includes date, month, year, import-id, importer, HS code, product description, brand, attributes, quantity, insurance, origin country, transaction type, and others. In addition, the company offers reports on trade statistics.

Logindex provides an online platform called gkni for global logistics data with a predictive analytics platform. The platform provides estimations for key economic figures, such as trade balance and industrial production, based on Kuehne + Nagel’s insights into markets and data of global trade flows. It is available as a platform and an API via subscription for logistics companies, banks and governments etc.

Allinfo offers import and export data based on bill lading document filed at customs. The data covers data type, product name, HS code, country, port, importer name, exporter name, and others. Offers data on imports and exports of USA, Argentina, Chile, Costa Rica, Panama, Peru, Paraguay, India, and Pakistan. The clients include Indira Foods, Aditya Birla Group, Bilcare, Bharat Logistics, and others. Offers subscription-based pricing model with price starting at $49/month.

CISExim offers customs trade data of Ukraine. The data includes product description, invoice cost, countries of origin, incoterms delivery terms, import/ export date, the name of importers, addresses of importers, HS Codes of products, contact details, and others. Priced based on the data per HScode.

TradeStatza offers trade data solutions. The data is gathered from ports around the world using shipping manifests, bill of landing, bill of entries, and shipping bills. The company claims to have data of more than 85+ countries. The clients include Cipla, Tata Steel, AsianPaints, DBS, Vedanta, and others.

EximStat offers trade data and marketplace solutions for trading goods to help importers and exporters. The data is helpful for comparing prices, competition, top importers/exporters, product, country of origin, departure, destination, and others. The data is used by customs, excise officials, shipping agencies, corporates, resellers, and others.

Tagmydeals (TAG) provides access to deal data, institutions, and individuals involved in the deals. The company covers commodity trade finance, export agency finance, trade finance guarantees, project, and infrastructure finance. TXF offers TFX data tool with add-in to allow users download data in excel. The clients include banks, law firms, exporters, borrowers, insurers etc.

RussiaExim offers data solutions on Russia's imports and exports. The data covers the list of importers, list of exporters, HS code, product description, total value, total quantity, origin and destination of shipments, and others. Helps to monitor shipments, get potential exporters and importers, and for overview of the Russian market. The clients include Genus, Eastman, Birlacril, Indofil Industries, Johnson Matthey, and others.

Russian Exports provides an information portal on the Russian market. It provides data analytics, news, business insights, and business services to corporations, companies, government agencies, and academic institutions. The offered business data includes trade statistics, key market players, competitors & potential business partners, and more.

Export Genius offers import and export trade details of Ethiopia. The database covers all the shipments that come/goes to Ethiopia via sea, air or road. The data fields include HS Code, product description, importer details, total value. Provides a search platform to search by HS code or product description. The data is beneficial for getting new customers, tracking competitor shipment, analyze best trade practices and reduce frauds/risks.

Exim Engine offers data and reports on imports and exports of world trade for sales prospects, evaluating suppliers, and monitoring competitors. In addition, the company offers graphs, and statistics on trade information by countries. The company claims to have data of more than 50M records being added every year.

Global Trade Data offers data on import and export transactions across the globe. It offers 6 kinds of global trade data namely Global Customs Data with importer, exporter, and HS code; Global Bills Data with consignee, shipper, detailed product descriptions; Global Trade Statistics with HS code, product, country, and port; Global Trade Flow with HS code, month and partner country; Global Exporters & Importers with HS code and product; Total Trade Data with HS Code, month, total quantity, and total value. In addition, the company offers research reports on trade statistics on a monthly basis.

TexPro offers data and insights related to the textile industry. It provides insights on international trade agreements, apparel and textile news, tariff and-tariff barriers in trade, textile import-export and trade fairs. It also provides trends and insights related to the trading and capture trade agreements, documents and reports.

TradeData offers data and reports on the customs data. It covers data from across the globe covering America, Europe, Oceania, Africa, and others. The data covers HS code, product name, month, trade code, trader name, city, quantity, price, shipment, routing, and others. In addition, the company also offers reports on customs statistics imports and exports.

Jrt Live Data provides real-time data for futures, options, commodities etc to charting software like Metastock, NinjaTrader, and Amibroker. Provides data in e-signal plugin format and available for multiple subscription plans each for stocks, commodities, forex etc.

Global Data provides an export-import database of Indonesia. The database based on actual shipment records includes supplier company name & address, importer tax ID, importer company address, product description, and quantity of merchandise exported and imported between various countries and its trading partners.

Trade Kompasss is the provider of import and export data in Russia, Ukraine, Belarus, Kazakhstan, USA, India, China, and Latin America. Provides data such as importer/exporter contact info, trade value, traded product metrics, etc. Users can choose the time span, country, industry and HS codes to get relevant data. Claims to have over 20 million records in their database. Some of the customers include Liptosa, Export Secret, Bord Bia, Mainstream etc.

CTS Provides globalised Container Shipping statistics on TEU volume movements and Price indices. CTS can provide detailed reports on container movements on a port to port basis as well as aggregated global reports. CTS is the exclusive agent of World Liner Data Limited (WLDL), promoting and selling liner shipping container data on its behalf. The WLDL database is derived from data supplied by many of the world's major container shipping lines.

Trade Genius specializes in providing India & international trade data. Trade Genius” owns a professional import and export trade research team composed of Indian & International experts. The company provides Indian trade data of more than 100 ports of India. It also provides import-export data for argentina, Perú, Colombia, Chile, Ukraine, Mexico, Uruguay, and Bangladesh. Apart from offering data, the company also provides market research, sales prospects identification, suppliers evaluation, and competitive analysis to the clients.

Trade Spy specialise in providing custom data of India and statistics in matters of import export and other international trade related terms. User can find prospective buyers and sellers, export import data of India,India Exports Data, India Imports Data or Indian Exporters Importers associations. The company provides import & export data for aluminium, cement, ceramic, chemical, cosmetic, cotton, electronic, fruit, fertilizer, and paper. Apart from Indian import export data the company also offers China import export data and import data for UK & US.

GoTradeData is the trade data search website with the imports and exports done by 51 countries. User can access and download the complete reports for only USD30. User can search an importer or exporter, a product or HS Code of the product. It allows them to identify the potential clients, identify suppliers, get to know the FOB$ and CIF$ values of the merchandise, open new markets, know and analyze the competition, know the market share, the countries of origin or destiny and much more.

JML International specialises in providing Mexico trade statistics, especially Mexico import/export data. Apart from the trade report, the company also offers trade services such as competitive analysis, market analysis, sourcing & supplying for mexico and Latin America. JML has partnered with Monex Canada to provide international business payment facility to its clients.

Trade Expert provides worldwide country reports and trade-related data. Its team of specialist that covers more than 120+ ports in India, extracts data from actual shipment records, operational document, and transit of merchandise. Subscription based revenue model. Subscription plans are yearly, half yearly and quarterly. Provides reports for 120 Indian ports and 23 global countries.

Kalalu & Sons helps exporters-importers or manufacturers to identify overseas markets related to their products by providing them with import-export data. Their data includes port-wise, month-wise, chapter-wise and product-wise export shipment data. Also provides USA Bill of Lading data. Provides Export-Import data for China, Vietnam, Indonesia, Sri-Lanka, Brazil, Argentina, Pakistan, Uruguay, Colombia, Chille and Peru.

SINOIMEX (Dalian Infobank Co., Ltd) is a provider of trade statistics of major trading countries in the world. The data has been used by government, institutions, associations, colleges and companies. Data comes from official source for example their local customs or national statistics agency. Usually the company collects bill of lading data, declaration data, importer and exporter listings or statistical data. Currently, its trade database covers 159 countries and continuously growing.

Seair Exim provides import/export shipment database for the needs of importers and exporters. Data is collected from custom department. Subscription based service. Founded in 2009 and is based in New Delhi.

Impex Statistic Services specialises in providing daily list of imports and exports data from the indian ports. The company provides the data from 35 ports/ICDs/Airports The company's team 'picks by hand' the list of data from the ports. Customers are from Importers/Exporters Traders, Industries, Customs House Agents, Logistic Companies, Freight Forwarders. Shipping Agents, Multi National Companies and other Service providers sectors.
Exim Genius specialises in providing Indian trade data. Its offerings include Indian export data, Indian import data, Indian port data, and Indian trade statistics.

Zauba.com is developed and managed by Legumex Impex Private Limited. Zauba is a provider of key trade intelligence and corporate information. Gathers trade data from all major ports in India and have information on more than 50,000 products exported from or imported into India. Zauba's corporate information is sourced from official registers and from published government data.

Short Sea Schedules is an online portal which provides information regarding shipping ports, routes, marine vessels scheduling etc. Users are provided with an interactive map with a click and search functionality for finding information of carriers, container shipments, schedule and timings from one port/city to the other.
Xportmine is an upcoming online platform which will provide global trade, customs, and shipment data. Pricing will be subscription based with different packages. Yet to launch as of January 2017.
